climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: LeakGuard Braid helps stop leaks before they happen
#1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand based on 2020 survey
Anti-Slip Grip on applicator makes the tampons easy to insert
Up to eight hours comfort and protection available in five absorbencies with Tampax Pearl tampons
Insert tampon applicator from the tip to the grip. To properly dispose, do not flush
body.description: It’s time to Tampax and live your life without limits. Get incredible all day comfort and protection for up to eight hours with Tampax Pearl tampons. Choose from five different absorbencies to match your changing flow. Got leaks? Go up an absorbency. Uncomfortable to remove? Go down an absorbency. Designed with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen. Tampax Pearl Regular/Super/Super Plus Absorbency provides protection you can feel good about. Free of dyes, perfume, latex, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching. Plus, inserting the tampon is made easy thanks to the applicator’s Anti-Slip Grip, while Tampax FormFit protection lets it gently expand to your individual shape. How to insert a tampon: Slowly insert the tampon applicator from the tip, all the way to the grip. After you’ve pushed the plunger in all the way, pull the applicator out. How to remove a tampon: You'll use your thumb and finger to grip the string and pull it slowly out. Please do not flush your tampon. Properly dispose of your tampon in the trash. natural rubber latex based on 2020 survey

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Find your Flow Combo If your tampon leaks just after a few hours, try going up an absorbency size for better comfort and protection*. Simply go up from Light to Regular or from your current size up to the next higher absorbency. Only Tampax Pearl tampons have five absorbencies so you can find your flow combo. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs Find your Flow Combo If your tampon is uncomfortable to remove, go down for a lighter absorbency*. Choose the right tampon absorbency throughout your period for better comfort and protection. Simply go down from Ultra to Super Plus or from your current size down to the next lightest absorbency. *Use the lowest absorbency that meets your needs

Outstanding Protection with Tampax Pearl LeakGuard Braid Tampax Pearl tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid that helps stop leaks by channeling them back into the core. Controlled Insertion The Anti-Slip Grip lets you hold the applicator securely, so you can insert the tampon with its rounded tip comfortably and easily. Smooth Removal Layer A smooth layer makes for easy tampon removal and outstanding comfort during your period. FormFit Protection FormFit design gently expands to fit your individual shape, so you can feel comfortable and confident during your period.

Frequently Asked Questions How does Tampax Pearl feel different than other tampons? Tampax Pearl Tampons have a special LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen, while a Smooth Removal Layer allows for easy removal. Plus, FormFit Protection gently expands to fit your individual shape. How long can I wear a tampon? You can wear a tampon for up to eight hours, but never leave it in for longer than that. If you usually sleep longer, set an alarm or just use a pad instead. How do I know which absorbency to use? Choosing the right tampon absorbency can make a big difference to be comfortable and avoid leaks. Take the Tampax Quiz on Tampax's website to learn more. What makes Tampax Pearl different from Tampax Pocket Pearl? Both Tampax Pearl and Tampax Pocket Pearl offer outstanding protection with a LeakGuard Braid to help prevent leaks. The main difference is that Tampax Pocket Pearl is compact in size so it fits in your pocket. When ready to use, extend the compact applicator to make it a full-size one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I can review this because I’ve used it before and I prefer them to other brands. The problem is that it was never delivered and it took a while to get a refund.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quick delivery, good price and great product. Thank you so much

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I seriously can’t use any other brand of tampons. I love having three different sizes. If ya know…ya know! Good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have very heavy periods and can’t use period cups due to extreme increase in cramps from them, so back to tampons I went. These worked way better than the Solimo ones I got previously. Not leakage at all, very impressed tbh! Will repurchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I love the variety of sizes so you don't have to buy different boxes. Also holds very well and easy to insert

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These are the only ones I ever use!! Others I’ve tried are uncomfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too many regulars for me
reviews.reviewText: The tampons themselves are okay but I am extremely disappointed at the number of each size in this box. Waaaaaay to many regulars, not enough balance with the super and super+ in my opinion. I unfortunately could not see the numbers in the images and no where on the page does it say how many of each you get. You get 18 regulars, and only 8 each of super and super+. I just wish I’d known that before buying because that would have been a pass for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Things like this make me feel like I'm crazy... IDK what the point of taking the tampons out of the box was when it was advertised as being in a box but this is weird. Not only that: I would've never thought to count my tampons had they been in a box and there's only 17R. 😐 Now I'm going back to read my order and description to see if I'm crazy. 🤔

reviews.reviewTitle: I thought it comes in 3 packs but was only one.
reviews.reviewText: I thought it comes in 3 packs but was only one.Paid three times more than the normal price.
